title: Glenmore Road, Paddington
content:
The goal was to breathe new life into a traditional Paddington terrace, celebrating its classic architectural charm while adapting it for modern family living. The homeowners wanted a stylish, comfortable home that honoured the character of the original structure but offered the ease and elegance of a contemporary lifestyle.

Inhaus Living approached the renovation with respect for the terraceâ€™s original features, carefully preserving its historical essence while layering in fresh, modern touches to enhance practicality, light, and overall flow.

Preserving Character: Original features such as decorative cornices, ceiling roses, and traditional architraves were retained to maintain a strong sense of heritage.

Modern Kitchen: A sleek, functional kitchen was introduced with crisp white cabinetry, stone benchtops, and high-end appliances, creating a clean and timeless heart of the home.

Refined Bathrooms: The bathrooms were reimagined with contemporary fixtures, neutral colour palettes, and subtle textures, offering spa-like calm while remaining highly functional.

Light and Flow: Internal reconfiguration, including the removal of unnecessary walls and careful lighting placement, improved natural light and created a more seamless connection between living spaces.

The result is a beautifully balanced home that marries the elegance of its historic bones with the clean lines and comfort of modern design. With thoughtful spatial planning, high-quality finishes, and a restrained yet warm palette, this terrace now stands as a sophisticated urban sanctuary, ideal for modern living in the heart of Paddington.

Make an enquiry today with Inhaus Living.
